basics.name: Business Development Associate
basics.label: Sales Professional
basics.summary: High performing and advanced sales professional of 10 years that can benefit your company. Extensive experience in sales and customer service, both in the auto and the software industry. Have sold almost $3 million in sales over the last 6 years at Thomson Reuters as an inside technical sales representative.

work.name: Thomson Reuters
work.summary: High achiever in fast-paced technical sales role. Presidents Club Member in the 2013 for being among the top 10% in sales for Thomson Reuters, sold over $695,000 products, support, and training. Have helped hundreds of accounting firms improve their technical process. Also served in other capacities including product support and team leadership.
highlights: Top in Core Sales in 2010 for Accounting CS
Top in Core Sales in 2010 for Accounting CS Payroll
Top Units Sold for Scheduled Training 2013

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Achieved top sales position within six months. Developed superior customer relations and services.
highlights: Averaged twice minimum quota in second year
